Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card

Class CardParser

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.CardParser
public class CardParser
extends java.lang.Object
Parser for GodPower objects.

Main responsibility of CardParser is to compose Lists of Lambda expressions out of GodPower objects given in input to its methods.

Since GodPower objects are extracted from Cards' configuration files, CardParser can be meant as an high level parser for those configuration files.

GodPower objects are extracted by ResourceManager.callGodPower(cardName) method when a Player chooses his/her Card.

Author:
AndreaAltomare
